empty.title: There are no payments.
empty.description: You have not made any payments yet.

Providers.title: Your payment providers
Providers.description: Manage your payment options, including Stripe, manual bank transfers, and Open Banking, all in one convenient place.

empty.title: No payment providers
empty.description: You have not added any payment providers yet.

AddProvider.title: Add Payment Provider
AddProvider.description: Easily integrate your preferred payment providers into your platform. Select from a range of providers to enable seamless transactions for your business.
AddProvider.openbankingDescription: Utilize OpenBanking for secure and direct bank payments, offering your customers a convenient way to pay directly from their bank accounts without needing to enter payment details.
AddProvider.stripeDescription: Incorporate Stripe to accept payments via credit card, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and more. Benefit from Stripe's comprehensive payment infrastructure and fraud prevention tools.
AddProvider.worldpayDescription: Connect with WorldPay for a reliable payment solution that supports a wide variety of payment methods globally, including credit cards, digital wallets, and bank transfers.
AddProvider.realexDescription: Connect with Realex for a reliable payment solution that supports a wide variety of payment methods globally, including credit cards, digital wallets, and bank transfers.
AddProvider.selectHint: Choose the type of payment provider
AddProvider.label: Payment Provider
AddProvider.banktransferDescription: Enable Manual Bank Transfer to offer your customers the option to pay through their bank. This method requires manual confirmation of payment receipts.

AddOpenbanking.title: Add OpenBanking Payment Provider
AddOpenbanking.name: Name
AddOpenbanking.nameHint: Give a name to this payment provider to help you recognize it
AddOpenbanking.accountHolderNameHint: Enter the name of the account holder as it appears on the bank account. This ensures payments are correctly attributed.
AddOpenbanking.accountHolderNameRequired: Bank Account Holder Name is required.
AddOpenbanking.ibanHint: Enter your International Bank Account Number (IBAN) for secure transactions.

AddBankTransfer.title: Add Manual Bank Transfer Payment Provider
AddBankTransfer.editTitle: Edit Manual Bank Transfer Payment Provider
AddBankTransfer.name: Name
AddBankTransfer.nameHint: Give a name to this payment provider to help you recognize it
AddBankTransfer.accountHolderNameHint: Enter the name of the bank account holder exactly as it appears on the account. This is required to match payments to their source accurately.
AddBankTransfer.accountHolderNameRequired: Bank Account Holder Name is required.
AddBankTransfer.ibanHint: Enter your International Bank Account Number (IBAN) for secure transactions.

AddStripe.title: Add Stripe Payment Provider
AddStripe.name: Name
AddStripe.nameHint: Assign a name to this Stripe configuration to easily identify it later
AddStripe.livePublishableKeyHint: This is the public key from your Stripe account used in the live environment. It allows your site to communicate with Stripe for payment processing.
AddStripe.liveSecretKeyHint: Your secret key for the live environment from Stripe.

AddWorldpay.title: Add Worldpay Payment Provider
AddWorldpay.name: Name
AddWorldpay.nameHint: Create a name for this Worldpay configuration to easily identify it among your payment options, such as 'Main Site Payments' or 'Event Registrations'.
AddWorldpay.merchantCodeHint: This is the unique identifier assigned to your Worldpay account. It's used to ensure that payments are sent to the correct merchant account.
AddWorldpay.installationIdHint: Your specific installation ID from Worldpay, required for integrating your payment gateway with the web application. This ties the payments to your account.

AddRealex.title: Add Realex Payment Provider
AddRealex.name: Name
AddRealex.nameHint: Create a name for this Realex configuration to easily identify it among your payment options, such as 'Main Site Payments' or 'Event Registrations'.
AddRealex.merchantIdHint: This is the unique identifier assigned to your Realex account. It's used to ensure that payments are sent to the correct merchant account.
AddRealex.sharedSecretHint: This is the Shared Secret from Realex, required for integrating your payment gateway with the web application. This ties the payments to your account.

Request.transactionFound: Transaction found with this reference code
Request.assignDescription: Send this payment to a user
Request.userPpsnHint: The Personal Public Service Number of the user you would like to assign this payment to

delete.cannotDelete: Cannot delete payment request since there are existing transactions

status.title: Status
status.activeDescription: This payment request is active and can be used to receive payments.
status.inactiveDescription: This payment request is inactive and cannot be used to receive payments.

form.title: Title
form.allowCustomAmount: Allow the user to pay a custom amount

deleteModal.title: Delete Payment Request
deleteModal.description: Are you sure you want to delete this payment request?

PayPaymentRequest.title: Pay your fee
PayPaymentRequest.errorNotReady: This payment form is not enabled yet to recieve any payments.

openbanking.title: Pay by bank app
openbanking.description: Make a direct payment securely from your bank app - no card needed

card.title: Credit/Debit card
card.description: Pay securely with your credit or debit card

PayPaymentRequest.name: Full Name

PayManualBankTransfer.title: Pay with a Manual Bank Transfer
PayManualBankTransfer.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur. Id aenean magna habitasse ut erat.

summary.title: Title
summary.referenceCodeDescription: Please use this reference code when making the money transfer, we will use it to identify your payment. If you forget to include it, your payment may not be processed correctly.

PayStripe.paymentRequiresPaymentMmethod: Your payment was not successful, please try again.

PaymentRequestError.tryAgain: Please return to My Portal and attempt the payment again

PreviewBanner.bannerText: This is a preview. Public servants are not allowed to make payments. If you want to proceed with payments, you must be logged in as a citizen.

AlphaBanner.bannerText: This is a new service - your feedback will help us to improve it.

main.title: Seamless secure payments you can trust
main.description: Our solution provides seamless integration for secure payments, built with a robust infrastructure to meet government standards. From tax payments to licensing fees, our system enables efficient financial transactions, instilling trust and peace of mind in every interaction.

integration.title: Seamless Integration
integration.description: Connect with multiple payment providers effortlessly. Whether it's credit cards, digital wallets, or bank transfers, Payments Building Block seamlessly integrates with diverse payment methods to offer flexibility to your constituents.

security.title: Enhanced Security
security.description: Your data security is our top priority. Payments Building Block employs encryption protocols and undergoes regular security audits to safeguard sensitive information and maintain Payment Card Industry (PCI) compliance, giving you peace of mind.

interface.title: User-Friendly Interface
interface.description: Simplify payment management with our intuitive user interface. From generating invoices to tracking transactions, Payments Building Block's user-friendly dashboard makes payment processing a breeze for both administrators and users

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: Meet regulatory standards in relation to accessibility directive for Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.0.

support.title: Dedicated Support
support.description: Our team of experts is here to assist you every step of the way. Whether you have technical questions or need assistance with implementation, Payments Building Block's dedicated support team ensures a smooth experience.

getStarted.title: Get Started
getStarted.description: Ready to transform your payment processes? Contact us to schedule a demo or learn more about how Payments Building Block can empower your public sector department.

ErrorPage.title: Ops, something went wrong
ErrorPage.description: We're sorry, but something unexpected happened and we couldn't process your request. Please try refreshing the page or come back later. If the problem persists, contact our support team for assistance. Thank you for your patience!
